Baking Gear & Ingredients

On this page

Recommended Baking Gear & Ingredients ​

Whether you're starting your home baking journey or looking to upgrade your tools, having the right equipment and ingredients makes a huge difference. Below is a curated list of products I personally use or recommend for making bread, tortillas, pastries, and pasta. Each item links directly to Amazon for your convenience.

Affiliate Disclaimer
This post contains affiliate links. As an Amazon Associate, I earn from qualifying purchases. If you click on a link and make a purchase, I may receive a small commission at no extra cost to you.

Equipment ​

Lodge Cast Iron Combo Cooker

Perfect for lean doughs like French bread or sourdough. The heavy lid traps steam naturally, producing a beautiful crust.

Buy on Amazon

Lodge Cast Iron Pizza Pan

Great for pizza and tortillas on the stove top due to excellent heat distribution.

Buy on Amazon

KitchenAid Digital Scale

Accurate weighing is essential for consistent results using baker’s percentages. The tare button makes swapping bowls effortless.

Buy on Amazon

Instant-Read Thermometer

Check water temperature and internal bread temperature easily.

Buy on Amazon

Thermapen ONE

Premium option for incredibly fast, precise readings.

Buy on Amazon

Pastry Mat (Non-Slip, With Measurements)

Roll dough, shape loaves, and keep counters clean.

Buy on Amazon

KitchenAid Stand Mixer

Useful for frosting, whipped cream, pasta dough, and occasional bread mixing if desired.

Buy on Amazon

KitchenAid Pasta Roller Set

Roll pasta sheets to perfect thickness and cut noodles for fresh homemade pasta.

Buy on Amazon

KitchenAid Pasta Extruder *(On My Wish List)*

Useful for frosting, whipped cream, pasta dough, and occasional bread mixing if desired.

Buy on Amazon

Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls

Ideal for mixing dough, bulk fermentation, or general prep.

Buy on Amazon

Glass Prep Bowls

Perfect for weighing ingredients individually before mixing.

Buy on Amazon

Bread Lame (for Scoring)

Essential for controlled slashing of sourdough or crusty breads.

Buy on Amazon

Half Sheet Pan + Cooling Rack

Useful for proofing, baking, and cooling breads and pastries.

Buy on Amazon

Silicone Dough Scraper

Scrape dough from counters and bowls cleanly without damaging surfaces.

Buy on Amazon

Ingredients ​

King Arthur Bread Flour

High-protein flour for consistent artisan bread results.

Buy on Amazon

Active Dry Yeast

Easier to measure accurately than small packets.

Buy on Amazon

Instant Dry Yeast (8 oz)

Mix directly into dough without proofing, ideal for precision baking.

Buy on Amazon

Recommended Books ​

Artisan Bread in Five Minutes a Day

Fantastic introduction to no-knead bread methods. Converting recipes to grams is recommended for accuracy.

Buy on Amazon

The Perfect Loaf *(On my wishlist)*

A highly respected sourdough book known for clear techniques and reliable formulas, it’s high on my wishlist for a reason.

Buy on Amazon
